public static enum Invoice.PaymentMode

Enum Constant Summary
IMMEDIATE_DEBIT
          This invoice must be paid immediately, i.e.
RESERVATION_DESIRED
          An attempt should be made to reserve the amount requested in the invoice, but if the reservation fails or is not supported by the payment provider, an immediate debit is also allowed.
RESERVATION_REQUIRED
          During the time of the payment, the amount requested should be reserved, but not debited.

Enum Constant Detail

IMMEDIATE_DEBIT

public static final Invoice.PaymentMode IMMEDIATE_DEBIT
This invoice must be paid immediately, i.e. payer's account should be debited.

RESERVATION_DESIRED

public static final Invoice.PaymentMode RESERVATION_DESIRED
An attempt should be made to reserve the amount requested in the invoice, but if the reservation fails or is not supported by the payment provider, an immediate debit is also allowed.

RESERVATION_REQUIRED

public static final Invoice.PaymentMode RESERVATION_REQUIRED
During the time of the payment, the amount requested should be reserved, but not debited.
